exercise-tasks.description: Find the name of all countries located in Oceania.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name FROM Countries
WHERE Region = 'Oceania';
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name FROM Countries
WHERE Region = 'Oceania';

exercise-tasks.description: Find the name and population of countries with a population greater than 50 million.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
WHERE Population > 50000000;
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name, Population FROM Countries
WHERE Population > 50000000;

exercise-tasks.description: Find the name and region of countries in either Asia or Europe using IN.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT Name, region FROM Countries
WHERE Region IN ('Asia', 'Europe');
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT Name, region FROM Countries
WHERE Region IN ('Asia', 'Europe');

exercise-tasks.description: Find all details about countries that are not in North America.
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT * FROM Countries
WHERE Region <> 'North America';
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT * FROM Countries
WHERE Region <> 'North America';

exercise-tasks.description: Find all details about countries with a population between 10 million and 100 million (inclusive).
exercise-tasks.correct-query:
SELECT * FROM Countries
WHERE Population BETWEEN 10000000 AND 100000000;
exercise-tasks.verify-query:
SELECT * FROM Countries
WHERE Population BETWEEN 10000000 AND 100000000;
